mutants.code:
def generate_ngrams(text, n=4):
    words = text.split(' ')
    ngrams = zip(*[words[i:] for i in range(n)])
    return [' '.join(ngram) for ngram in ngrams]

def generate_ngrams(text, n=2):
    words = text.split(' ')
    ngrams = zip(*[words[i:] for i in range(n)])
    return [' '.join(ngram) for ngram in ngrams]
